content.body: annevk: do you think it would be reasonable to make Request/Response transferable? I think the biggest piece there is the bodies and they are already transferable... i can open an issue with more detail if this sounds generally coherent.
content.formatted_body: annevk: do you think it would be reasonable to make Request/Response transferable? I think the biggest piece there is the bodies and they are already transferable... i can open an issue with more detail if this sounds generally coherent.

content.body: Would be good to clarify the use case beyond passing the bodies.
